docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: IN A SMALL OFFICE IN the department of psychiatry at the State University of New York's Stony Brook, L.I., campus, an anxious man and a withdrawn woman face a blank television screen. Irene Carasiti, a registered nurse, slides a 22-minute tape into a video-cassette player. The man hunches forward; his wife remains apathetic.
